instructions: On the Home screen, tap the camera icon to open the Camera app. Switch to Selfie Panorama mode. See Choosing a capture mode for details. Make sure that Selfie Panorama wide mode icon Hold the phone at face level and in portrait orientation. When you're ready to take the center shot, tap Camera shutter button Or simply squeeze the lower sides of your phone. While holding your phone steadily, slowly swivel left or right on the phone's axis until you see the white capture box move to the side panel of the panorama overlay. Screen showing a selfie panorama panning to the right. Then, slowly swivel to the opposite side until you see the white capture box move to the other side of the panorama overlay. Screen showing a selfie panorama panning to the left.
